attributes.action: open another NHS Dentist in Whitby North Yorkshire.
attributes.background: open another one please. Ive waited 3 years and still no appointment and im on the priorty list .

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about opening a new dental practice are a matter for individual dentists, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding to ensure all adults and children have access to a dentist: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625518
